description: This is a dashboard for the Discord bot Killua to monitor various statistics.

panels.description: Number of users that have installed Killua over time
panels.title: User Installs Over Time

panels.description: Showing if all the shards are logged in
panels.title: System health

panels.description: Number of guilds Killua has been added to over time
panels.title: Guilds Over Time

panels.description: How much RAM the bot is using
panels.title: RAM usage

panels.description: How long it takes to scrape the data from prometheus
panels.title: Scrape Duration

panels.description: The amount of users saved in the mongodb database
panels.title: Registered users

panels.description: Distribution of how often commands were used
panels.title: Command usage

panels.description: The estimates country a user is from based on the language they set their Discord to
panels.title: User location

panels.description: The commands (of any kind) ran in the last 24hrs
panels.title: Commands ran

panels.description: The amount of users that use Killua daily, reset every 24 hours
panels.title: Daily active users

panels.description: The upvotes for Killua on sites like top.gg
panels.title: Votes for the bot

panels.description: Users who boost the support server or have an active Patreon or Discord bot subscription
panels.title: Premium users

panels.description: The combined amount of members of all servers Killua is in
panels.title: Approximate total users

panels.description: The time the API takes to connect to the zeromq connection for the bot
panels.title: IPC connection time

panels.description: The amount of requests that are identified as potential hacking attempts
panels.title: Spam requests

panels.description: How long Killua API takes to respond
panels.title: API response time

panels.description: The type of logs outputted to the console on the bot process
panels.title: Logs

panels.description: The total number of cards in circulation
panels.title: Cards in circulation

panels.description: The largest amount of non fake, restricted slot cards someone has
panels.title: Biggest collection

panels.description: The number of tags registered overall using Killua
panels.title: Total tags registered

panels.description: The number of tags registered overall using Killua
panels.title: Total tags registered

panels.description: The number of todo tasks created overall using Killua
panels.title: Todo tasks

list.description: The public facing url of the api
list.name: apiUrl

title: Killua statistics
